channel.title: CVE Feed for EasyPHP -- Webserver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EasyPHP -- Webserver

item.title: CVE-2023-3767|2023-09-26T07:51:36.754Z -- easyphp -- webserver
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability has been found on EasyPHP Webserver affecting version 14.1. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to get full access to the system by sending a specially crafted exploit to the /index.php?zone=settings parameter.
